channel.title: Person standing in my way
channel.description:
Hey everyone!
I just started the level "On a Rail" and there you meet a security person who talks about a rocket that I should launch (I don't have the coordinates, sorry). I went inside his booth to lift the barrier and then he kept standing in the doorframe. Of course I can shoot him, but you know, I am a peaceful person. Just move him a little bit.
[url]https://www.abload.de/img/2012-09-17_00001veoki.jpg[/url]
And by the way - I love this mod!

item.title: Person standing in my way
item.dc:creator: der_eismann
item.description:
Hey everyone!

I just started the level “On a Rail” and there you meet a security person who talks about a rocket that I should launch (I don’t have the coordinates, sorry). I went inside his booth to lift the barrier and then he kept standing in the doorframe. Of course I can shoot him, but you know, I am a peaceful person. Just move him a little bit.

https://www.abload.de/img/2012-09-17_00001veoki.jpg

And by the way - I love this mod!
